message: My friend of a friend came through, and he has several 5x6foot rolls of whiteboard sticker / contact paper for the space.
Will be great for planning RBCC
awesome, yeah, we have the door, side of vending machine and other magnetic places.. A giant corkboard would be cool...

He'll get them Sat. (25 Jun), and I'll get them when I'm back from the weekend.  I can have them at the space Mon. or Tue.   We COULD affix them to some thin/large plastic and do the pipe-strap/plumbers tape idea to make a magnetic grid, but maybe that is overthinking things.  We don't really really need it to be magnetic, right?
I have them in my possession, will drop them by the space shortly.  I think I have 5 or 6 in this tube, my friend asks that we save him two or three.
